title: Cheesy orzo and potatoes
ingredients: ['30g butter', '200g uncooked orzo pasta', '2 teaspoons finely chopped garlic', '2 potatoes, peeled and diced', '1 carrot, sliced', '1 onion, chopped', '1 teaspoon dried Italian herb seasoning', 'salt and pepper to taste', '700ml water', '1 cube vegetable stock', '80g freshly grated Parmesan cheese']
